overview: Bad Habitus Project collates images and ideas about the city of Newcastle. It is a portrait of the city built out of the stuff it has discarded: junk, used machinery, decaying vegetation, and is activated by the presence of the artist. Crow feels out its atmospherics, reproduces and reflects the quality of the city's space as it metamorphoses into its bicentenary, making visible its invisible sense of place.
title: Bad Habitus Project
